title: Linux dirs Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux dirs command, which allows you to manage the directory stack, navigate directories efficiently, and understand the practical applications of this powerful tool.

meta.title: Linux dirs Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux dirs command, which allows you to manage the directory stack, navigate directories efficiently, and understand the practical applications of this powerful tool.
meta.keywords: Linux, dirs command, directory stack, pushd, popd, file management, navigation

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Syntax of the dirs Command

verify.name: Verify the purpose and syntax of the dirs command
verify.hint: Make sure you understand the purpose of the dirs command and can use it to display the current directory stack.

steps.title: Explore the Directory Stack Using the dirs Command

verify.name: Verify the ability to explore the directory stack
verify.hint: Make sure you can use the dirs command to explore the contents of the directory stack, including navigating to specific directories in the stack.

steps.title: Manage the Directory Stack with pushd and popd Commands

verify.name: Verify the ability to manage the directory stack
verify.hint: Make sure you can use the pushd and popd commands to add and remove directories from the stack, and that the final state of the stack is as expected.
